description:
Resume template for Product Designers


Changes


  • New Dark Theme CV
  • Examples of great CV from top Product Designers
  • Easy to change colors and styles



Description


Do you want your resume to pass it to the interview phase?


Most resumes from designers only focus on the tasks they have been doing and the tools they know.


Like that, it is very hard sometimes to understand the value they can give to a company.


This template takes the feedback from many recruiters and hiring managers into account.
